Tablets now a days are being preferred over real books. Discuss the impact of technology on education media such as books and magazines. In future, will the tablets replace libraries?
now a days tablets are very much impacted in the people.tablets are very use ful in these days .becaue the generation will be very fast.  when using tablets we know everything.in using tablets we know about international news using internet.using tablets we do work very easily.in using tablets we learn more things.in future definately tablets replaces libraries.

            when using the tablet the fact is eyes are to be damaged .it will be controled by way of using.not be used every time .when ever the work is there then we use it.when using the tablets we know every thing what happen in the world and we see what is going inthe world.in these days tablets are very useful.when using the tablet the work should be done very quickly.whenusing the tablet  we work any ware any place. it takke any place with us .using tablet we can make presentation.
